headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Creative Destruction
content:
Arena War doesn’t care what seedy corner of Southern San Andreas you emerged from: whoever you are, there’s a way for you to burst into flames to the roar of deranged applause.

There are a host of different modes to try, from tactical team battles to last-man-standing infernos. Buy an Arena Workshop at www.arenawar.tv and head down there to begin your career - or if you just want some no-strings-attached carnage, head on over to an Arena War Series blip at Maze Bank Arena.
